ingredients.ingredient: 7 (3 ounce) packages assorted fruit flavored Jell-O® mix
1 (12 fluid ounce) can evaporated milk, divided
1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed

cookingTips: Dissolve each gelatin separately with correct hot water measurements
Allow each layer to set partially before adding the next
Whipped topping layers should be spread while gelatin is slightly tacky
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How do I get distinct, separate layers in a gelatin salad without them mixing?
